blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: So I ship Phan, and read smut, but since you posted about it hurting DNPs feelings and making them feel weird and shit, I feel...
question: So I ship Phan, and read smut, but since you posted about it hurting DNPs feelings and making them feel weird and shit, I feel guiltyyy, but I genuinely ship Phan...
answer:
Here’s the thing anon: that post was submitted. Someone else wrote it. You want my opinion?


It’s alright if you ship them. It’s alright if you read smut. Shit, it’s alright if you write or draw smut. Just don’t be a jackass about it.


The thing with shipping real people is that it’s not inherently bad. But you can quickly turn it sour by shoving it in everyone’s face and assuming that it’s true just because you think it is, without any regard for the actual real people you’re talking about.


Dan and Phil are okay with the shipping. They encourage the fanfictions and the art, and they play into it quite a bit themselves. I genuinely don’t think that you reading smut is going to rip their friendship apart.


As long as you’re respectful, and acknowledge that your theories are not fact, then there’s not really any issue.

summary: Dan said he was doing a photoshoot but idk what it’s for (and it doesn’t look like Phil is involved...?)
question: Dan said he was doing a photoshoot but idk what it’s for (and it doesn’t look like Phil is involved...?)
answer:
Dan’s at an office doing a photo shoot.


Phil’s at the dentist.


The dentists office.


Dan’s doing a photo shoot for the dentist.


Case closed.

Hey hey hey buddos! I’m currently reading the scarlet letter for my AP Lang class.
